t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia

t: It's Our Job to Shop: These Are the Amazon Brands to Keep on Your Radar

t: 21 Women-Owned Brands Available on Amazon 2025
s: March 15, 2025 - Meet DedCool, the woman-founded, gender-neutral fragrance brand that wants you to define your own personal scent. What makes them truly stand out, though, is the sheer breadth of DedCool's products: ranging from perfumes and body lotions to car fresheners, room sprays, and even laundry detergent.

t: Amazon's Private Label Brands | The Complete List | Tinuiti
s: February 15, 2024 - There are three distinct Amazon private label food brands, each with a unique offering and target audience. First, there’s Amazon Happy Belly, which offers kitchen basics like coffee, trail mix and nuts.

t: Amazon owns more than 80 private-label brands — see the list
s: October 8, 2018 - Everyone knows Amazon owns brands like AmazonBasics, but there are many more that are less obvious. Some of the private-label brands are even exclusive to Prime members. See some of the brands you didn't realize were owned by Amazon.

t: What is Brand Marketing? Definition and examples | Amazon Ads
s: August 11, 2021 - The channels available for a brand marketing strategy are the same channels that companies can use for product marketing activities, such as digital, social, and paid search advertising. A good strategy is to use different channels together to create a media mix that reaches a wide audience.

t: Popular Trail Mix Brands, Ranked Worst To Best - Mashed
s: June 18, 2022 - Many reviewers on Amazon bring up the uneven ratio, and with regards to flavor, numerous consumers find this mix to be not so fresh-tasting, powdery, and somewhat stale. If you prefer a trail mix with more ingredients that are less clumped together, then you might want to look for another brand.
